resources.string: https://support.google.com/pixelphone?p=battery_usage
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/?p=battery_saver_settings
Adaptive Battery learns from your phone usage to continuously optimize how apps use battery. To extend battery life, it may reduce performance and delay notifications.
On the next screen, hold your phone at eye level
When using Face Unlock, your head may need to be more directly in front of your phone.

Looking at the phone can unlock it even when you don’t intend to. Your phone can also be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling, or if someone holds it up to your face.
Using your child’s face to unlock their phone may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password
Using your face to unlock your phone may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password
Face Unlock can require your eyes to be open to unlock the phone or verify it’s you. You can turn this option on at any time in Settings.
Face Unlock can require your child’s eyes to be open to unlock the phone or verify it’s them. You and your child can turn this option on at any time in Settings.

"Face Unlock creates a unique model of your face to verify it’s you. To create this face model during setup, you will take images of your face from different angles.
When you use Face Unlock, images are used to update your face model. Images used to create your face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on your phone and never leaves the phone. All processing occurs securely on your phone."

"Face Unlock creates a unique model of your child’s face to verify it’s them. To create this face model during setup, your child will take images of their face from different angles.
When they use Face Unlock, images are used to update their face model. Images used to create their face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on the phone and never leaves the phone. All processing occurs securely on the phone."

"You can delete your face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the phone until you delete them.

Learn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock."

"You and your child can delete their face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the phone until they’re deleted.

Learn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock."
https://support.google.com/googlepixeltablet/?p=battery_drain
https://support.google.com/googlepixeltablet/?p=battery_saver
Adaptive Battery learns from your tablet usage to continuously optimize how apps use battery. To extend battery life, it may reduce performance and delay notifications.
On the next screen, hold your tablet at eye level
When using Face Unlock, your head may need to be more directly in front of your tablet.

Looking at the tablet can unlock it even when you don’t intend to. Your tablet can also be unlocked by someone who looks a lot like you, like an identical sibling, or if someone holds it up to your face.
Using your child’s face to unlock their tablet may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password
Using your face to unlock your tablet may be less secure than a strong pattern, PIN, or password
Face Unlock can require your eyes to be open to unlock the tablet or verify it’s you. You can turn this option on at any time in Settings.
Face Unlock can require your child’s eyes to be open to unlock the tablet or verify it’s them. You and your child can turn this option on at any time in Settings.

"Face Unlock creates a unique model of your face to verify it’s you. To create this face model during setup, you will take images of your face from different angles.
When you use Face Unlock, images are used to update your face model. Images used to create your face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on your tablet and never leaves the tablet. All processing occurs securely on your tablet."

"Face Unlock creates a unique model of your child’s face to verify it’s them. To create this face model during setup, your child will take images of their face from different angles.
When they use Face Unlock, images are used to update their face model. Images used to create their face model are not stored, but the face model is stored securely on the tablet and never leaves the tablet. All processing occurs securely on the tablet."

"You can delete your face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the tablet until you delete them.

Learn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock."

"You and your child can delete their face model or turn off Face Unlock at any time in Settings. Face models are stored on the tablet until they’re deleted.

Learn more at g.co/pixel/faceunlock."
